name: Alchemy Combine
description:
Controls - WASD to move, click on the wizard or alchemy table to interact, esc to exit alchemy table, r to reset alchemy table.

Help your fellow alchemist to figure out the recipe for the philosopher's stone and create the elixir of life.

Footage

Theme

My interpretation of the theme is that you are trying to discover recipes in order to share the knowledge with the other alchemist and he will in turn give you tips.

GitHub - https://github.com/awwthefirst/BacktraceGameJam

Developer-Thomas Vegar  - forsync0@gmail.com - https://twitter.com/ForSync0
